title: All my emails have disappeared
creator: txgm1
content: After an email update this morning, I went in to look at an old email and nothing was there. Checked all my other folders and they were all empty. How and/or can I get them back. Some were ones that I did not need to loose.

title: No columna in message list 147.0.2
creator: Creid
content:
I just got a new Windows 11 computer. After installing Thunderbird 147.0.2 I noticed there were no columns at the top of the message pane as there had been in the past. I read articles about how to add the columns but could not find the column icon or anything in the header area that allowed me to do what the articles recommended.

I want to add the columns for sorting purposes from time to time but I can't find a way to do it. HELP!!! Please?

Thanks, Clyde
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/145.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;tb_version:147.0.2;os:Windows 11;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/message-list-columns"]

title: Filter rule ends with: "Could not get folder db".
creator: massimo.biancucci
content:
Hi,

when I try to apply filter, TB responds with "Could not get folder db". I tried to repair msf file, delete it, create new subfolders or folders, delete and recreate rule. Nothing seems to make it work. Any hint ?
